metadata.title: CVE-2017-5192 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When using the local_batch client from salt-api in SaltStack Salt before2015.8.13, 2016.3.x before 2016.3.5, and 2016.11.x before 2016.11.2,external authentication is not respected, enabling all authentication to bebypassed.The LocalClient.cmd_batch() method client does not accept external_authcredentials and so access to it from salt-api has been removed fornow. This vulnerability allows code execution for already-authenticatedusers and is only in effect when running salt-api as the root user.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
